title: Sion Scripting/exploit
body: Was playing a game with friends and the enemy team had a sion doing this same exploit, i have recordings and screen shots of the Player, not going to name names on this forum but would love a rioter to look into this exploit

replies.body:
That accuracy.

But yeah, you should remove that link.

A Caution to anyone thinking of downloading this file, I can almost guarantee  its full of malware and at the very least use of the exploit will get you banned permanently.

-SumCoolAid
